Collecting and Citing Sources

Created by Caitlin Meyer, Shannon Roux, Taylor Harper, Shushanik Stepanyan, Kian Ravaei

Affiliated with UCLA?

If you are affiliated with UCLA and would like to receive certification of completion for this workshop, be sure to Log in and Enroll in WI+RE's CCLE site before completing this workshop.

Not affiliated with UCLA?

No problem! All of our workshops and activities are open access and freely available to all! Enjoy the activities!

Related Resources

About this workshop

Authors

Caitlin Meyer, Shannon Roux, Taylor Harper, Shushanik Stepanyan, Kian Ravaei

Contributors

Simon Lee, Doug Worsham

Learning Outcomes

  • Install Zotero and create a Zotero account
  • Save and organize your sources
  • Quickly generate a bibliography in your preferred citation style
